sorular.soru: Which crossing drivers should you expect here?

feedback.metin: Sign J-24 warns you of crossing cyclists and moped riders. This also includes snorfietsers and speed pedelec riders. You should not expect crossing brommobiel drivers here, because they have to follow the rules of the motor vehicles instead of the mopeds.

sorular.soru: With some medicines, you should expect them to affect your ability to drive. When should you always consider this?
cevaplar: When medicines have a yellow warning sticker.
When this is stated in the leaflet of the medication.
When the medicines have been prescribed by a physician.
If the medicines were bought from the pharmacy.
dogruCevap: When medicines have a yellow warning sticker.
When this is stated in the leaflet of the medication.

feedback.metin: For medicines with a yellow sticker and medicines where this is stated in the package leaflet, you should always be aware that they may affect your ability to drive. This can happen both with medications prescribed by a physician and those you can buy without a prescription at the pharmacy or drugstore. It is certainly not the case that all medication prescribed by a physician affects your ability to drive. You can also check this on the internet at www.rijveiligmetmedicijnen.nl.
